name: Puzzle Invasion
description:
What?! Puzzle invasion? 😖 INTRODUCTION

YEAHHHH, that's right! 😱 "Zombie" puzzle pieces are trying to set something up by completing that old cardboard puzzle you left in the attic for .. hummmm ... 25 years! That is so from the 90's! Go back to your paper contry! 

Let's put them back in the respective boxes, otherwise they'll steal our precious time!

Glue them as fast as you can before they reach their destination and step right on the respective colored floor tile to make them DIEEEEEEEE 🔪 .... sorry ... but no ... caa humm .. this is for educational purposes only, so lets just say they disappear ok?! 💨

GAME CONTROLS

- W/A/S/D or ARROWS to WALK
- LEFT-CLICK to SHOOT (Hold on your MOUSE or click as fast as you can 🤯)
- LEFT-SHIFT to RUN (But will consume points!!)
- R to RELOAD (This will not be cheap)
- SCROLL to ZOOM

OBJECTIVE

- THEY WALK! - Survive for as long as you can! Don't let the puzzle get completed by the "puzzlerssss"! (Was trying to make an anology with "Walkers", but forget it 😏 ...)

- SHOOT AND DROP! - Just glue them and get them stuck on the floor.

- STEP ON THE HOLE! - Run to the corresponding colored tile that pops on the puzzle floor with the same corresponding color of the piece that just fell, but do it fast because they won't give up, and they'll be up again in no time! 😢

- WIN POINTS! - Don't run so fast, don't spend too many bullets, doing any of these actions will run out with the precious coins you hardly earned!, you may need them latter!

- SHARE! - Share your score, we would like to hear from you!!👾
For how long will you survive? How many waves will you last? How many terrifyyinngg "puzzleeers" will you actually KILLLLLLL ... Sryy, caaahh cummm, "puffeedd" ... "vanished"?
